content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{\"size\":4301,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6bfd9dfa-ed95-45ab-a8bd-e3dd2626d9f5/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6bfd9dfa-ed95-45ab-a8bd-e3dd2626d9f5/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6bfd9dfa-ed95-45ab-a8bd-e3dd2626d9f5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":205,\"height\":59},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Communities\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we build communities to set up a playground for our best talents to share best practices and ideas, give people the chance to get recognized. For communities from all over the world, we have created a special platform – \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://wearecommunity.io/?utm_source=adaptation\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We Are Community\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With this platform, we have the opportunity to host communities based on skill sets, location, and areas of interest and connect with a wide audience of software engineers both within our company and outside of it. Through ‘We Are Community’, you can connect people who work in tech and who want to grow, share expertise, solve real problems, create innovations, and develop different technologies and directions through the community from any domain, country or company.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We invite you to join communities now or build your own! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":92642,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f046bd88-a495-4f17-b536-69c761fe03c3/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f046bd88-a495-4f17-b536-69c761fe03c3/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f046bd88-a495-4f17-b536-69c761fe03c3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":624,\"height\":264},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Events\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://wearecommunity.io/?utm_source=adaptation\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Community Platform\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is also about Events. You are encouraged to visit Tech Talks, Meetups, Workshops, Conferences, Town halls, Gatherings and Open days, Hackathons and other exciting events to learn more and enhance your skills.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After joining our team, you will also take advantage of visiting our unforgettable team buildings, office and project events.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keep up with what’s new in the EPAM events world!
